SEARCH
Package Model

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Model.Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
The Hotel class represents a hotel with a unique name, a collection of rooms, and various properties related to room pricing and availability.

  • Constructor Summary

    Hotel(String name, int numOfRooms)
    Constructs a new Hotel with the specified name and number of rooms.
